content.prompt: Complete the function according to its docstring.  When you think you are done, click "Submit" to have your code tested.  If both tests pass, congrats!  If one or both fails, edit your code and resubmit.
content.source_code:
[student_code]
def total_slices(num_pizzas, slices_per_pizza):
    """ (int, int) -> int

    Return the total number of slices in num_pizzas pizzas that each have
    slices_per_pizza slices.
    
    >>> total_slices(2, 30)
    60
    >>> total_slices(1, 8)
    8
    """
[/student_code]
